videoDetails.Title: Tank Crew Skills in War Thunder Explained - REMANNED | War Thunder Crew Skills Guide
videoDetails.Description:
REMAN: to man again or anew.
Crew skills are a crucial aspect in Ground battles. Although often overlooked, these skills can increase your tank's performance by a significant amount. Today, I explain every single tank crew skill with visual guides. This is a remake of one of my first videos, and I've corrected several mistakes, given it a fresh new voice-over and visuals and made it much more accurate. It's also a remake of a remake, which somehow managed to be worse than its original video lol. This time, I actually did research and tested how the skills work in-game, and the voice-over doesn't sound like I'm rapping.

──── TIMESTAMPS ────
📘 0:00 Intro
0:15 How crew skills work

📘 2:48 Generic skills
3:19 Keen Vision
5:55 Field Repair
6:25 Agility
6:44 Vitality

📘 7:21 Unique skills
7:29 Tank driving
8:48 Targeting
9:44 Rangefinding
10:23 Leadership
10:45 Weapon reloading
11:24 Artillery targeting accuracy
11:47 Artillery strike calling time
12:11 Radio communication
12:32 Repair speed

📘 13:28 Conclusion: what to upgrade first, etc.
📘 16:08 Outro
──────────────────
